scripts.build-transform-light: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/light.json Light,light, spectrum
scripts.build-transform-dark: npx token-transformer tokens.json tokens/dark.json Dark,dark, spectrum
scripts.build-transform: npm run build-transform-spectrum && build-transform-light && npm run build-transform-dark
scripts.build: npm run build-transform && npm run build-styledictionary
